bibl.idno: The Papers of Henry Rose Carter [manuscript] ; HEALTHSCI MS-10.

bibl.title: Letter from Frederick F. Russell to Laura Armistead Carter, November 12, 1928

div1.p: Russell offers Carter a suggestion on tracking down a particular reference.

div1.head: Letter from Frederick F. Russell to Laura Armistead Carter, November 12, 1928
div1.opener:
SELSKAR M. GUNN, VICE PRESIDENT
IN EUROPE
ROGER S. GREENE, VICE PRESIDENT
IN FAR EAST
----
ASSOCIATE DIRECTORS
JOHN A. FERRELL, M.D.
VICTOR G. HEISER, M.D.
H. H. HOWARD, M.D.
WILBUR A. SAWYER, M.D.
JOHN D. ROCKEFELLER, JR.
CHAIRMAN OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES
GEORGE E. VINCENT
PRESIDENT
THE ROCKEFELLER FOUNDATION
INTERNATIONAL HEALTH DIVISION
FREDERICK F. RUSSELL, M.D., DIRECTOR
61 BROADWAY, NEW YORK
CABLE ADDRESS “ROCKFOUND”
NORMA S. THOMPSON, SECRETARY
L. G. MYERS, TREASURER
GEORGE J. REAL, COMPTROLLER
----
TRUSTEES DIVISIONAL COMMITTEE
THE PRESIDENT
SIMON FLEXNER
VERNON KELLOGG
WILLIAM ALLEN WHITE
Book, Misel
Russell, F. F.
November 12, 1928
Dear Miss Carter:
div1.p:
I have your recent letter in regard to the
progress of your work.

If you are able to locate the book of Spanish
epidemiology by Villalba in any other library you might
be able to get a photostat copy of it made. I hope you
will be able to find it before the book goes to press.
div1.closer:
Very sincerely yours, F F Russell It was a pleasure to see you, even
for a moment in Washington. I have had
to hurry back to New York.
F F Russell
Miss Laura A. Carter
The Westmoreland
2122 California Street NW
Washington, D.C.
FFR:R:DH
